gameDetails.name: Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull & Shackles Adventure Deck 2 â€“ Raiders of the Fever Sea
gameDetails.description: Players set sail upon the pirate-infested high seas in this new Adventure Deck expansion for the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull & Shackles Base Set! This 110-card expansion includes new locations, monsters, villains, loot, ship-to-ship sea battles, and more, as well as 5 new scenarios that constitute the complete "Raiders of the Fever Sea" adventure. Chart a course for victory with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Raiders of the Fever Sea Adventure Deck!
